member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ColorSense
member.summary: A ColorSense module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ColorSense.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ColorSense.ToggleOnboardLED(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Toggles the on-board LEDs to the passed in state.
member.param: State to set the LEDs to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ColorSense.ReadColorChannels
member.summary: Reads the current color from the sensor and returns the results
member.returns: Returns an instance of the ColorChannels structure, holding the current measurement of color values.
